name: Lumi: The Last Light
description:
Lumi's once beautiful and vibrant home island has been engulfed by an unknown dark entity overnight. The whole island and its many unique inhibiting creatures are now overcome by the darkness . Luckily, or unluckily, Lumi is the sole survivor of the attack and must now escape the island before the darkness overshadows Lumi.

This game is currently in pre-alpha and is still far from being finished. Art and sounds assets only used for pre-alpha.
